## Part I - Reading VCF data
### VCF file structure
```{r}
library(vcfR)
data(vcfR_example)
vcf
```

### The meta region
```{r}
strwrap(vcf@meta[1:7])
queryMETA(vcf)
queryMETA(vcf, element = 'DP')
queryMETA(vcf, element = 'FORMAT=<ID=DP')
```

### The fix region
```{r}
head(getFIX(vcf))
```

### The gt region
```{r}
vcf@gt[1:6, 1:4]
```

### vcfR
```{r}
vcf <- read.vcfR("data/pinfsc50_filtered.vcf.gz")
head(vcf)
write.vcf(vcf, "data/myVCFdata_filtered.vcf.gz")
```
